short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Word and character counter for any text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Count Words and Characters Anywhere by Just Highlighting

-Word Counter: Instantly counts the number of words in your highlighted text.
-Character Counter: Quickly displays the total character count of the selected text.
-Customizable Position: Move the counter box anywhere on your screen for convenience.
-Adjustable Text Size: Easily enlarge the text in the counter box for better visibility.
